title: Changing Course: Natalie Fung
description: From PR to data science, Natalie Fung, a graduating master's student, on becoming a “double Trojan” after a life-altering accident.

title: Ph.D. Student Named Apple Scholar for Human-Centered LLM Research
description: "ChatGPT, do you know who I am?" Computer science doctoral student Brihi Joshi studies the symbiotic relationship between humans and large language models.

title: USC at the Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS)
description: USC researchers will highlight 28 papers at the Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS).

title: Hibiscus, a HackSC Engineering product
description: HackSC Engineering brings a new feature-loaded product with the potential to revolutionize the hackathon space once again.

title: Trump indicted in January 6 riots
description: The former president's arraignment begins on Thursday, but if convicted, he would still be allowed to run in 2024.

title: USC Computer Science Students Awarded NSF Graduate Research Fellowships
description: Emily Nguyen and James Flemings were recognized for their contributions to deep generative models focusing on wildfire prevention and privacy in machine learning.

title: USC Computer Science Student Makes Strides in Queer in AI Movement
description: As a member of the award-winning, international group, Nathan Dennler is empowering LGBTQ+ voices in AI research.

title: Two USC Computer Science Juniors Awarded Goldwater Scholarships
description: Juniors Jordan Cahoon and Allen Chang were recognized for their research in, and beyond, computer science.

title: AthenaHacks USC Creates Community
description: More than 400 students took part in USC's hackathon for marginalized gender identities, now in its seventh year.

title: Robot Tutors Read Children’s Emotions As They Learn
description: Bored? Frustrated? Tired? New AI models could help robots read emotions and provide more personalized feedback.

title: Scott Rabenold appointed senior vice president for university advancement
description: Rabenold will join USC in February 2023.

title: Morning, Trojan
description: Essential headlines for USC students every weekday morning, curated and written by Tomoki Chien, copy edited by Anna Hsu.

title: Humans and robots: Stefanos Nikolaidis fosters anthro-machine collaboration in manufacturing
description: Nikolaidis received the Agilent 2022 Early Career Professor Award in July.

title: Cyber-paving the way to success
description: Jefferson students placed third at CyberPatriot Nationals after three years of hard work and dedication.

title: Phishing scams target Jefferson students
description: In the last week, Jefferson students have reported being sent suspicious Facebook links that look like YouTube thumbnails, with the text-only message "Sankapp: Is it you in the video?"

title: Discord creates peace of mind
description: Jefferson organizations gravitate to Discord as a new way to uphold traditions.
